context.p: Provide standard customer relationship management (CRM) process, sales automation process, workflow approval process, etc., covering sales management automation, partner relationship management, marketing, customer service and many other aspects.（ListContinue 10.5pt）

Sales epaas platform
It provides a highly customized development platform (e-paas platform for sales), which helps developers to carry out secondary development quickly and efficiently to meet the complex and special business needs. On demand services do not require any software.
